name: Keen Rialto II 3 Point Sandals - Men's
description:
Free your toes in sandals built for trekking in warm climates and exploring long stretches of sand. Adjustable straps over the foot and behind the heel let you customize the fit for your foot. The quick-drying lining and antimicrobial treatment keep these smelling fresh, even after getting wet.Waterproof leather upper has 2 adjustable hook-and-loop straps for a secure fit.Adjustable heel strap.Quick-dry lining for active use.Cleansport NXT™ antimicrobial treatment resists odour build-up.Soft microsuede footbed has arch support and metatarsal ridge for all-day comfort.Injection-moulded PU midsole cushions feet.Non-marking rubber outsole is great for any surface.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
